article_metadata.description: GOSHEN – Congressman Sean Patrick Maloney was in Goshen Tuesday to promote a new bipartisan bill that would provide grant money to fund a new law enforcement approach to low-level drug offenders: treatment instead of arrest.The move was spurred by the upward spiraling of heroin and opioid addiction across the U.S., Maloney said.
